price: Então, que seu dito não te entristeça. Por certo, sabemos o de que guardam segredo e o que manifestam.
arabic: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum innā naʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
